location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

mods.abstract: Blueprint plan showing buildings at Ras Hilf on Masira Island [Masirah Island xx Jazīrat Maşīrah], Oman. Among the buildings highlighted in the plan are: guard tents, latrine, bomb stores and BOAC dormitory and mess.The plan is prepared by G S Cooper, Civil Engineer, Air Headquarters, Iraq as part of a report titled ‘REPORT ON SOUTH ARABIAN COAST- INSPECTION TOUR- SEPTEMBER, 1942’. The plan itself is marked as Appendix G.
